name: bitwarden
tagline: A secure password manager with encrypted vaults and multi-device synchronization
description: Bitwarden is a secure, open-source password manager with browser, mobile, and desktop clients. It allows self-hosted password vaults, secure sharing, autofill, and zero-knowledge encryption with sync across devices.

features.title: End-to-End Encryption
features.description: Securely store unlimited passwords with zero-knowledge encryption. Complete security

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Browser extensions, mobile apps, and desktop clients. Access everywhere

features.title: Two-Factor Authentication
features.description: Add extra security layer with 2FA support. Enhanced protection

features.title: Password Generator
features.description: Create strong, unique passwords automatically. Never reuse passwords

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Run your own vault for complete data ownership. Maximum privacy

features.title: Real-Time Sync
features.description: Keep passwords updated on all your devices. Always in sync
